name: linkage/sendgrid-marketing-campaign-api-client
description: simple php client for sendgrid marketing campaign apis

scripts.test: # To run your tests using this command, you must define your test script in composer.json.

scripts-descriptions.analyse: Analyses code in this project fully.
scripts-descriptions.fix: Tries to fix code in this project automatically.
scripts-descriptions.fix:all: Tries to fix code in this project automatically fully.
scripts-descriptions.fix:rector: Tries to fix code in this project automatically with rector enabled.
scripts-descriptions.fix:risky: Tries to fix code in this project automatically with risky rules.
